official_title: A bill to provide for the free entry of a bell for the use of the National Children's Island, Incorporated, Washington, District of Columbia, and to provide transportation for such bell.

summary.text: Provides for the free entry of a bell for the use of the National Children's Island, Incorporated, Washington, DC, and provides transportation for the bell.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the free entry of a bell for the use of the National Children's Island, Incorporated, Washington, District of Columbia, and to provide transportation for such bell.
